name: Formula: Redrot Bait
desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Redrot Bait.

value.text: Exchange at the Mondstadt Fishing Association

value.name: Redrot Bait
value.desc:
Fish bait made from mixing Dendrobium and mashed meat. The unique rank sweetness of this bait spreads very quickly in the water, attracting fierce aquatic predators. Use with caution, however! Put too much of this bait down and you might hook in nastier customers than you bargained for!

Suitable for catching Sticklebacks, Bettas, Venomspine Fish, Akai Maou, and Snowstriders.

customize.name: Nantuck
customize.desc: A senior fisherman in the Mondstadt Fishing Association and a soon-to-be famous sea-life author. He guarantees that his story about a heroic fisherman pursuing a giant black whale will be a literary success once published.

customize.name: Redrot Bait
customize.desc:
Fish bait made from mixing Dendrobium and mashed meat. The unique rank sweetness of this bait spreads very quickly in the water, attracting fierce aquatic predators. Use with caution, however! Put too much of this bait down and you might hook in nastier customers than you bargained for!

Suitable for catching Sticklebacks, Bettas, Venomspine Fish, Akai Maou, and Snowstriders.

customize.name: Dendrobium
customize.desc: A vibrant plant that has also been named the "lycoris" by the poets. It was once thought extinct in the Inazuman archipelago, only to re-emerge now upon the battlefields. It is said that it blooms most enchantingly where much blood was spilled.

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Formula: False Worm Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making False Worm Bait.

customize.name: Formula: Fake Fly Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fake Fly Bait.
